name: Has Title with Proper Style
description: Document must have a title using the Title style or Heading 1 style. The title should be well-formatted and appear at the beginning of the document.

name: Uses Heading Styles for Structure
description: Document must use proper heading styles (Heading 1, Heading 2, Heading 3, etc.) to create a clear hierarchical structure. Evidence of using the style function for headings and subheadings is required.

name: Has Figure with Numbered Caption
description: Document must contain at least one figure with a properly formatted caption created using Word's Insert Caption function. The caption should follow the format 'Figure X: Description' where X is a number.

name: Has Cross-Reference to Figure
description: Document must include at least one cross-reference to a figure in the text, created using Word's Cross-Reference function. The cross-reference should automatically link to the figure number or caption.

name: Has Table with Numbered Caption
description: Document must contain at least one table with a properly formatted caption created using Word's Insert Caption function. The caption should follow the format 'Table X: Description' where X is a number.

name: Has Cross-Reference to Table
description: Document must include at least one cross-reference to a table in the text, created using Word's Cross-Reference function. The cross-reference should automatically link to the table number or caption.

name: Has Numbered Equation on Own Line
description: Document must contain at least one equation positioned on its own line and numbered using Word's Insert Caption function. The equation should be centered or right-aligned with the number on the right side.

name: Has Cross-Reference to Equation
description: Document must include at least one cross-reference to an equation in the text, created using Word's Cross-Reference function. The cross-reference should automatically link to the equation number.
